mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PASS , USERS_NM , TO_CHAR(USERS_BIR, 'YYYYMMDD')USERS_BIR , USERS_GEN , USERS_IMG , MEM_MAIL , MEM_TEL , MEM_ZIP , MEM_ADDR1 , MEM_ADDR2 , MEM_DELETE FROM USERS JOIN MEMBER ON(USERS_ID=MEM_ID) WHERE Mem_ID = #{memId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DELETE = 'Y' WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
